    • Method Detail

      • round2

        public static double round2(double d)
        Performs a round which is accurate to within 1 ulp. i.e. for values very close to 0.5 it might be rounded up or down. This is a pragmatic choice for performance reasons as it is assumed you are not working on the edge of the precision of double.
        Parameters:
        d - value to round
        Returns:
        rounded value

      • compare

        public static int compare(long x,
          long y)
        Compares two long values numerically. The value returned is identical to what would be returned by: 
            Long.valueOf(x).compareTo(Long.valueOf(y))
        Parameters:
        x - the first long to compare
        y - the second long to compare
        Returns:
        the value 0 if x == y; a value less than 0 if x < y; and a value greater than 0 if x > y
